author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Neovasc's Management And Board Of Directors Urge Shareholders To Vote In Favor Of The Proposed Reverse Stock Split
text:
May 15 (Reuters) - Neovasc Inc:
* NEOVASCâ€™S MANAGEMENT AND BOARD OF DIRECTORS URGE SHAREHOLDERS TO VOTE IN FAVOR OF THE PROPOSED REVERSE STOCK SPLIT AT THE UPCOMING ANNUAL GENERAL AND SPECIAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS
* NEOVASC INC - MANAGEMENT BELIEVES THAT IT IS IN BEST INTEREST OF COMPANY AND ITS STAKEHOLDERS TO REMAIN ON NASDAQ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
